name: Liam Dehaudt's EPIC Life Simulator
description:
The life of an aspiring game developer isn't always easy...

Liam Dehaudt wants to become a game developer. Will you be able to guide him from homelessness to potential fame and fortune. Liam Dehaudt's EPIC Life Simulator is a brutal idle-inspired adventure.

Small disclaimer that this is fictional and I am/was not actually homeless in case anyone was worried..

twitter
